metadata.pdfFile: Chapter 87 Vehicles Other Than Railway Or Tramway Rolling-Stock, And Parts And Accessories Thereof.pdf

sectionNotes:
Main Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
No.
Notification
Date

This Section does not cover articles of heading 9503 or 9508 or bobsleighs, toboggans and the
like of heading 9506.

The expressions ""parts"" and ""parts and accessories"" do not apply to the following articles,
whether or not they are identifiable as for the goods of this Section: (a) joints, washers or the like
of any material (classified according to their constituent material or in heading 8484) or other
articles of vulcanised rubber other than hard rubber (heading 4016), (b) parts of general use, as
defined in Note 2 to Section XV, of base metal (Section XV), or similar goods of plastics (

Main Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Date
Notification No
This Chapter does not cover railway or tramway rolling-stock designed solely for running on rails.

For the purposes of this Chapter, "tractors" means vehicles constructed essentially for hauling or
pushing another vehicle, appliance or load, whether or not they contain subsidiary provision for
the transport,in connection with the main use of the tractor, of tools, seeds, fertilizers or other
goods. Machines and working tools designed for fitting to tractors of heading 8701 as
interchangeable equipment remain classified in their respective headings even if presented with
the tractor, and whether or not mountedon it.
Motor chassis fitted with cabs fall in headings 8702 to 8704, and not in heading 8706.

Heading 8712 includes all children s bicycles. Other children s cyclesfall in heading 9503.
Sub-Heading Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Notification No

Date

Sub-heading 8708 22 covers : (a) front windscreens (windshields), rear windows and other
windows, framed; and (b) front windscreens (windshields), rear windows and other windows,
whether or not framed, incorporating heating devices or other electrical or electronic devices,
when suitable for use solely or principally with the motor vehicles of headings 8701 to 8705.
Supplementary Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Date
Notification No

For the purposes of tariff item 8711 60 80, the term ?E-bicycle or battery operated pedal
assisted vehicle? means vehicle equipped with an auxiliary electric motor having a thirty-minute
power less than 0.25 kW and maximum speed not exceeding 25 km/h and conforming to the
provisions of the Motor Vehicles Act, 1988 (59 of 1988) and the rules made thereunder.
Policy Condition
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Date
Notification No

Vintage motor cars and vintage motor cycles including their parts and components are
'Restricted' for Export. i. Export of Vintage motor cars, parts and components thereof
manufactured prior to 01.01.1950 is permitted only against a Restricted Export Authorisation ii.
Export of Vintage motorcycles, parts and components thereof manufactured prior to 01.01.1940
is permitted only against a Restricted Export Authorisation

chapterNotes:
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Date
Notification No
This Chapter does not cover railway or tramway rolling-stock designed solely for running on rails.

For the purposes of this Chapter, "tractors" means vehicles constructed essentially for hauling or
pushing another vehicle, appliance or load, whether or not they contain subsidiary provision for
the transport,in connection with the main use of the tractor, of tools, seeds, fertilizers or other
goods. Machines and working tools designed for fitting to tractors of heading 8701 as
interchangeable equipment remain classified in their respective headings even if presented with
the tractor, and whether or not mountedon it.
Motor chassis fitted with cabs fall in headings 8702 to 8704, and not in heading 8706.

Heading 8712 includes all children s bicycles. Other children s cyclesfall in heading 9503.
Sub-Heading Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Notification No

Date

Sub-heading 8708 22 covers : (a) front windscreens (windshields), rear windows and other
windows, framed; and (b) front windscreens (windshields), rear windows and other windows,
whether or not framed, incorporating heating devices or other electrical or electronic devices,
when suitable for use solely or principally with the motor vehicles of headings 8701 to 8705.
Supplementary Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Date
Notification No

For the purposes of tariff item 8711 60 80, the term ?E-bicycle or battery operated pedal
assisted vehicle? means vehicle equipped with an auxiliary electric motor having a thirty-minute
power less than 0.25 kW and maximum speed not exceeding 25 km/h and conforming to the
provisions of the Motor Vehicles Act, 1988 (59 of 1988) and the rules made thereunder.

policyConditions.description:
Vintage motor cars and vintage motor cycles including their parts and components are
'Restricted' for Export. i. Export of Vintage motor cars, parts and components thereof
manufactured prior to 01.01.1950 is permitted only against a Restricted Export Authorisation ii.
Export of Vintage motorcycles, parts and components thereof manufactured prior to 01.01.1940
is permitted only against a Restricted Export Authorisation
